#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
bool isprime(int n){
	for(int i=2;i*i<=n;i++){
		if(n%i==0) return false;
	}
	return true;
}
int main() {
    vector<int>prime;
    prime.push_back(2);
    for(int i=3;i<1000000;i+=2){
    	if(isprime(i)) prime.push_back(i);
	}
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
		int x,y;
		scanf("%d%d",&x,&y);
		int count=0,i=0;
		while(prime[i]<x) i++;
		while(prime[i]<=y){
			count++;
			i++;
		}
		cout<<count<<endl;
	}
    return 0;
}
